title: Episode 41: Mark Bello
description:
This week on Let’s Eat In, Cathy is joined by Pizza Enthusiast and Artisan
Mark Bello. Mark tells us about his various workshops and catering endeavors, including Pizza a Casa and the Pizza Sufficiency Center. Tune in to find out how you can make pizza at home and why Neapolitan purists refuse to use rolling pins or through dough. This episode was sponsored by Hearst Ranch: purveyors of grass-fed beef from the California coast.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
